intent_atoms.description: Blocked tasks must be updated whenever blocker status changes to maintain day‑to‑day visibility.
Import licensed real‑world assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real‑world payloads once licensing approvals are obtained.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures must be granted before importing assets.
Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark once macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture becomes available in the automation environment.
Benchmark must run with ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMARK_PAYLOAD_BYTES=1073741824, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive them under Documentation/Performance/.
The todo.md entry "Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark" remains open until the run completes and metrics are published.
Perform manual performance profiling with Xcode Instruments on a macOS developer machine to measure render times, memory usage, and frame rates for FoundationUI Phase 5.2.
Render times must be under 100 ms, memory allocations under 5 MB, and Core Animation must verify 60 FPS on device.
Perform manual performance benchmarks across iOS 17, macOS 14, and iPadOS 17 to validate build time, binary size, memory footprint, frame rate, and complex node rendering.

Build time must be under 10s for a clean build, binary size under 500KB release, memory footprint under 5MB per screen, and 60 FPS during interactions; BoxTreePattern with 1000+ nodes must run without performance regressions.
Conduct cross‑platform testing on iOS, macOS, and iPadOS devices and simulators to verify dark mode, RTL language support, and locale/region variations.
All listed device configurations must be tested and results compiled into a cross‑platform report.
Perform manual accessibility testing with VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic type, and other accessibility features to achieve final accessibility sign‑off for FoundationUI Phase 5.2.
All listed accessibility tests must be performed; 98% automated accessibility score already achieved; manual edge‑case testing must complete before final sign‑off.

functional_units.name: Import Licensed Media Assets
functional_units.description: Import licensed Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H assets into the system and refresh regression baselines for tolerant parsing and export validation.

functional_units.name: Execute macOS 1 GiB Benchmark
functional_units.description: Run the lenient‑vs‑strict performance benchmark on a macOS machine with a 1 GiB payload, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive results in Documentation/Performance.

functional_units.name: Publish Performance Baselines
functional_units.description: Publish collected performance baselines for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 into PERFORMANCE.md after profiling or benchmarking is complete.

functional_units.name: Generate Cross‑Platform Test Report
functional_units.description: Compile cross‑platform test results from iOS, macOS, and iPadOS devices/simulators and produce a comprehensive report.

functional_units.name: Perform Manual Accessibility Sign‑off
functional_units.description: Conduct manual VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic type, contrast, and other accessibility tests on real devices to achieve final accessibility approval.
